code: import React,{useState}from'react';import TopNav from'./components/common/layout/TopNav';import SecondaryNav from'./components/common/layout/SecondaryNav';import Dashboard from'./pages/Dashboard/index';import CompanySetup from'./pages/company-setup';import Finance from'./pages/finance';import CapTable from'./pages/cap-table';import Marketing from'./pages/marketing';import HR from'./pages/hr';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[activeTab,setActiveTab]=useState('dashboard');const tabs=[{id:'dashboard',name:'Dashboard'},{id:'company',name:'Company Setup'},{id:'finance',name:'Finance'},{id:'captable',name:'Cap Table'},{id:'marketing',name:'Marketing'},{id:'hr',name:'HR'}];const renderContent=()=>{switch(activeTab){case'dashboard':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Dashboard,{});case'company':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CompanySetup,{});case'finance':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Finance,{});case'captable':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CapTable,{});case'marketing':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Marketing,{});case'hr':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HR,{});default:return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Dashboard,{});}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"min-h-screen bg-gray-50",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TopNav,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SecondaryNav,{tabs:tabs,activeTab:activeTab,onTabChange:setActiveTab}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("main",{className:"max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8 py-8",children:renderContent()})]});}export default App;
